channel.title: Location on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Location on SoftLayer API

item.title: getAccount
item.description:
REST Example

'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Location_Reservation/{SoftLayer_Location_ReservationID}/getAccount'
